cab.content: Operations.From: General Plumer, Italy. To: C. I. G. S., War Office.Despatched 10.10 p.m. 24.11.17. Received 5.0 a.u. 25,11,17.Ov49.Situation is practically unchanged. There has been some pretty severe local fighting as indicated in the situation telegram. Italians have lost one or two posts ant,, advanced trenches but on the whole they have held their own well. I saw Diaz this morning and he is satisfied generally with the situation.The leading French division and our leading division are just Hi. of the Erenta this evening. By tc-morrow we shall have portions of 2 divisions across the Brenta and the third division closing up. Our troops are marching well.
